nodes.text: The StarCave Nebula was a nebula where Lando Calrissian had an adventure prior to the raid on Kessel.

The StarCave Nebula originates in the 1983 Legends novel Lando Calrissian and the Starcave of ThonBoka, where it is known as the ThonBoka, which translates as "StarCave Nebula". The location was introduced into the Star Wars canon when it was mentioned in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
